Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Scoot \Scoot\, v. i. To walk fast; to go quickly; to run hastily away. [Colloq. & Humorous, U. S.] [1913 Webster]
scoot v : run or move very quickly or hastily; "She dashed into the yard" [syn: {dart}, {dash}, {scud}, {flash}, {shoot}]
